mapper.select: select s.*, r.*,c.REPRESENTATIVE,c.client_name from SECONDARY_CLIENT s,COUNSEL_RECORD r, client c where s.CLIENT_ID=c.CLIENT_ID and s.SEC_CLIENT_ID=r.SEC_CLIENT_ID and r.COUNSEL_ID=#{value}

select e.EMPLOYEE_ID,e.EMPLOYEE_NAME,e.department_id from employee e,department d where e.department_id=#{value} minus select e.EMPLOYEE_ID,e.EMPLOYEE_NAME,e.department_id from employee e,department d where e.employee_id=d.manager_id order by 2

select b.EMPLOYEE_NAME,a.employee_id,a.sales_goal,a.year,a.month,b.department_id,b.file_position from (select e.EMPLOYEE_ID,e.EMPLOYEE_NAME,e.department_id from employee e,department d where e.department_id=#{department_id} minus select e.EMPLOYEE_ID,e.EMPLOYEE_NAME,e.department_id from employee e,department d where e.employee_id=d.manager_id) b,monthly_goal a where a.employee_id=b.employee_id and b.department_id=1 and year = #{year} and month = #{month}
update MONTHLY_GOAL set sales_goal = #{sales_goal} where employee_id=#{employee_id} and year = #{year} and month = #{month}
